name: Rotten Jimmy's Primate Control
description:
The worst possible thing has come to fruition: The gorilla got out, and has somehow almost instantaneously learned how to maneuver in zero gravity environments.  Enjoy the best part of any phone call to a larger corporation: navigating the maze of an automated phone help line in hopes that you can survive this particularly lethal chimp event. 

Controls:

Strafe/ Thrust: WASD

Rotate Left: Q

Rotate Right: E

Ascend: Space

Descend: Ctrl

Interact: Left Click

Phone Controls: numbers 1 - 4

this project was made as a submission for the JameGam GameJam, and as such was made in a short time. we hope you enjoy!
